articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Foreign judges will remain part of HK's 'hard as a rock' judicial system - Lam - Reuters
articles.description: Hong Kong will continue to invite foreign judges to its courts and the city's legal system remains "hard as a rock", Chief Executive Carrie Lam said on Tuesday amid international concern about the impact of a sweeping national security law.

articles.author: Megan Rowling
articles.title: G7 leaders urged to show solidarity on climate change and COVID-19 at summit - Reuters
articles.description: Pressure is growing on leaders of the G7 club of rich nations to provide more funding to deal with climate change and surplus COVID-19 vaccines for developing countries as an act of global solidarity when they meet this coming weekend in Britain.

articles.title: No chance to be children: life in Canada's residential schools - Reuters

articles.author: Timour Azhari
articles.title: INSIGHT-Lebanese banks swallow at least $250m in U.N. aid - Reuters
articles.description: At least $250 million in U.N. humanitarian aid intended for refugees and poor communities in Lebanon has been lost to banks selling the local currency at highly unfavourable rates, a Thomson Reuters Foundation investigation has found.
articles.content:
